Package Game.Gun

Class Pistol

java.lang.Object
Game.Gun.Weapon
Game.Gun.Gun
Game.Gun.Pistol
All Implemented Interfaces:
GamePublisher, IBehaviour
public class Pistol extends Gun
Class that represents a pistol weapon. Inherits all shooting and reloading logic from Gun.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pistol

      public Pistol(IGameObject owner, double bulletSpeed, double damage, double fireRate, double reloadTime, int magazineSize, int maxAmmo, double distanceFromOwner)
      Constructs a pistol with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      owner - the owning game object
      bulletSpeed - speed of the bullet
      damage - damage per shot
      fireRate - shots per second
      reloadTime - time to reload
      magazineSize - bullets per magazine
      maxAmmo - maximum ammo
      distanceFromOwner - distance from owner to orbit
